entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:34 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
